description:
Smooth out climbs and get to the top without feeling gassed. With 12 gears and up 520% more mechanical advantage, this GX cassette helps you stay fresh all ride long. If you're waiting for the latest and greatest, then GX kit is your groupset. With the best technology from SRAM’s top of the line groupsets, GX gets all the tech, without all the price.

  • Eagle technology provides fast, smooth shifts
  • X-Glide™2 improves inboard and outboard shifting, as well as chain retention
  • Full Pin™ technology pairs lightweight stamped cogs with strong 123 stainless steel pins
  • Open design clears mud
  • XD™ hub driver for ultimate compatibility
name: SRAM GX Eagle XG-1275 12 Speed 10-52t Cassette
